name: Story Craft
storyline:
Story Craft is a story-writing simulation game using ChatGPT.
Story Craft serves to conveniently relay communication between game users and AI.
This is a game where the user can check the AI's response and enjoy it.

First, register your character. A close friend, a crush, or a boss who harasses you are all possible.
The story can take place in a variety of genres. The story changes depending on your choice: horror, thriller, romance, comedy, etc.
Creating a background image is also a fun feature.
Images are created according to detailed descriptions, such as a snow-covered shelter in Greenland, a lunar exploration base, and a leisurely fishing village.
Once the story has progressed to a certain extent, you can end it, and the completed story can be serialized.

Well, I hope you enjoy your own story.
summary:
Story Craft is a story-writing simulation game using ChatGPT.
Register your friends as characters and create your own story!
